title: Stop ChatGPT from interrupting you 🙄
summary: The speaker introduces themselves as part of a multimodal team for Chat GPT and explains that they have worked on a fix for a common issue related to pausing during interactions. Now, users can press and hold on the screen to pause, think, and respond as much as they want before releasing, at which point the model should respond. The speaker encourages users to continue providing feedback as they work on improving the user experience in the following weeks.
